overview: Maggie Wilderotter has served as a member of Yahoo’s Board of Directors since July 2007. She has been chairman of the Board of Directors and chief executive officer of Citizens Communications (NYSE: CZN) since January 2006. She joined Citizens as president, chief executive officer and a member of the Board of Directors in November 2004. Prior to this, Ms. Wilderotter was senior vice president of Worldwide Public Sector at Microsoft Corporation and was president, chief executive officer and a member of the Board of Directors of Wink Communications, Inc. and held senior leadership positions in other communications companies. Ms. Wilderotter also serves on the Board of Directors of The Xerox Corporation and The Tribune Company. She holds a bachelor’s degree in Economics and Business Administration from The College of the Holy Cross.
